remarks: No proper subset of a basis spans the space.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Jun-2014.)
statement:
lbsind2.j $e |- J = ( LBasis ` W ) $.
lbsind2.n $e |- N = ( LSpan ` W ) $.
lbsind2.f $e |- F = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lbsind2.o $e |- .1. = ( 1r ` F ) $.
lbsind2.z $e |- .0. = ( 0g ` F ) $.
lbspss.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
lbspss $p |- ( ( ( W e. LMod /\ .1. =/= .0. ) /\ B e. J /\ C C. B ) -> ( N ` C ) =/= V ) $.
